column2: we got there at 4 and the place was packed
column3: and we waited 30 minutes. This is a good sign though! I like Lou Malnati's more and more each time I try their pizza. If you wanna go the classic Chicago route
column4: go with Lou's classic.. (The one with sausage
column6: etc) its sooo good! Their house salads are great
column7: especially since you wait about 40 minutes for your pizza to come out.. its nice to have. Thin crust is very good as well.
